title: Isua rawn bel teh
lyrics:
Isua rawn bel teh,
Lawma'n a nghak a che,
Vakvai, thahnem ngaiin,
Isua rawn bel teh.

Isua rawn bel teh,
Tlana'n a nghak che;
Sal riangvai, lawm takin,
Isua rawn bel teh.

Isua rawn bel teh,
Chhawkan'n a nghak a che;
Thian rit phur, chau chungin,
Isua rawn bel teh.

Isua rawn bel teh,
Nun pek a tum a che;
Mitdel, hmu fiah turin,
Isua rawn bel teh.

Isua rawn bel teh,
Humhim a tum a che;
Chhia tha, kal hram hramin,
Isua rawn bel teh.

Isua rawn bel teh,
Hruaia'n a nghak a che;
Kawng hre lo, mua
g takin,
Isua rawn bel teh.
